channel.title: How to make a City a "safe zone"?
channel.description:
ok..........
i have added a new city (its on a island) but you can just attack anyone when ever you want!!! I need to make it a safe zone.......... can someone tell me how...... It would be greatly appriciated............
THanks

item.title: How to make a City a "safe zone"?
item.dc:creator: @master_montage master_montage
item.description:
@master_montage wrote:

i do own a server…but i cant figure it out!!!

item.title: How to make a City a "safe zone"?
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || (absY >= 2620 && absY <= 2579 && absX <= 3902 && absX >= 3879) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 11:39:31 PM[/size][hr]delete what you have in there and put that

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a City a "safe zone"?
item.dc:creator: @master_montage master_montage
item.description:
@master_montage wrote:

ok this is what i have under it:

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; } public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2579 && absY <= 2620 && absX <= 3879 && absX >= 3902) return true; else return false; }

thats it!

Read full topic

this is what each of the cords are

(absX >=2887 && absX <=2927 && absY >=9670 && absY <=9698 )|| sw ne sw ne you need to find the southwest and north east cords and make a code for it...just like above and add it to yours

item.source: How to make a City a "safe zone"?

item.title: How to make a City a "safe zone"?
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

k just get a sw cord and a ne cords of half the island and insert those cords instead of the full island cords[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 10:41:24 PM[/size][hr]you will see something like this in your client.jav

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2887 && absX <=2927 && absY >=9670 && absY <=9698 )||(absX >=2895 && absX <=2923 && absY >=9714 && absY <=9745 )||(absX >=2753 && absX <=2806 && absY >=9177 && absY <=9216 )||(absX >= 3269 && absY >= 2752 && absX <= 3320 && absY <= 2809) || (absX >=2615 && absX <=2669 && absY >=3657 && absY <=3696) || (absX >=3102 && absX <=3119 && absY >=3921 && absY <=3949) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic
